class_notes: Students who have taken the course DSC 101Q - Who's Got Talent? may not enroll in this class.
course_description: Students will study intellectual giftedness, the many different types of creativity, and even critically examine the evidence for ESP. The course will focus on issues of definition, designing effective educational systems, acceptance of the gifted by society, and the latest research findings.
